entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
